{"id": "AddInt", "name": "Add two integers", "version": "1.0", "description": "Add two integers together.", "authors": [{"name": "Marcel Koek", "email": "m.koek@erasmusmc.nl", "url": "http://www.bigr.nl/people/MarcelKoek"}], "command": {"version": "0.1", "url": "", "targets": [{"class": "LocalBinaryTarget", "os": "*", "arch": "*", "interpreter": "python", "paths": "./bin", "bin": "addint.py"}], "description": "
      addint.py value1 value2
      output = value1 + value2
    ", "authors": [{"name": "Marcel Koek", "email": "m.koek@erasmusmc.nl", "url": "http://www.bigr.nl/people/MarcelKoek"}]}, "repository": null, "interface": {"id": "AddInt_0.1_interface", "class": "FastrInterface", "inputs": [{"parent": "AddInt_0.1_interface", "id": "left_hand", "name": "left hand value", "datatype": "Int", "prefix": "--in1", "repeat_prefix": false, "cardinality": "1-*", "nospace": false, "format": null, "required": true, "default": null, "description": "", "order": 0, "hidden": false, "join": null}, {"parent": "AddInt_0.1_interface", "id": "right_hand", "name": "right hand value", "datatype": "Int", "prefix": "--in2", "repeat_prefix": false, "cardinality": "as:left_hand", "nospace": false, "format": null, "required": true, "default": null, "description": "", "order": 1, "hidden": false, "join": null}], "outputs": [{"parent": "AddInt_0.1_interface", "id": "result", "name": "Resulting value", "datatype": "Int", "prefix": null, "repeat_prefix": false, "cardinality": "as:left_hand", "nospace": false, "format": null, "required": false, "default": null, "description": "The summation of left_hand and right_hand.", "order": 0, "hidden": false, "join": null, "automatic": true, "action": null, "location": "^RESULT=(.*)$", "separator": null, "method": "json", "negate": false}]}, "tests": ["./test/addint"], "cite": "", "help": "", "tags": [], "url": null, "requirements": null, "references": [], "filename": "/home/hachterberg/dev/fastr/fastr/fastr/resources/tools/fastr/math/0.1/addint.xml", "namespace": "fastr.math", "class": "Node"}
